The leader is not the one who eats first. 

The leader is the one who has the power to eat first but chooses to eat last.

AI is the great automator, and to automate, it must first imitate. 

The imitation fools people into thinking itâ€™s alive.
Expectations are a one-way ratchet.
People who donâ€™t organize into tribes get wiped out by people who do.
Wisdom is the set of things that we have to be reminded of over and over again.
Incompressible.

There is no place to rest your head.

Intelligence and talent are not normally distributed. Leverage magnifies the distinctions. 

The capable ones make everyone better off, but themselves most of all.

Itâ€™s not that the rich are getting richer, itâ€™s that the â€œsmart, leveraged, and high agencyâ€ are getting richer.
